author: markt
msg: Fix bug 20709. Use same setting for 'Djava.endorsed.dirs' when starting
via menu as for service and batch file.

author: markt
msg: - Fix bug 18383. Admin app should set path to "" rather than "/" for a new root context.
The path in the mbean name still needs to be "/" to prevent naming error.
- Removed unused imports identified by Eclipse.

author: markt
msg: - Fix bug19801. Request dispatcher does not set empty javax.servlet.include request attributes
Based on a patch suggested by Matthias Ernst
- Removed unused imports identified by Eclipse.

author: markt
msg: Fix bug 9851. Digest authentication failed with Mozilla and other issues re RFC2617.
- Based on a patch supplied by Juan Carlos Estibariz.

author: markt
msg: Fix bug 18141. Support parameters with multiple values in CGI servlet.
